main event: Nine spherical objects were observed on ground radar traveling at a high speed.
interesting points: The objects were seen traveling at approximately 6,000 mph for about 9.5 minutes., The sighting coincided with atmospheric conditions that may have affected radar returns., Only one radio operator aboard a nearby aircraft reported seeing shooting stars but did not identify the radar targets as unusual., The radar observers experienced similar returns at different installations before., The radar targets were lost in ground clutter after being tracked for about 24 seconds.
sighted object: nine spherical objects on ground radar
witness description: staff from Castle AFB including radar operators and approach control personnel
